General.Name: Longvie SA
General.Description: Longvie S.A. produces and sells household appliances in Argentina. It offers washing machines, car washers, kitchens, ovens, stoves, water heaters, hot water tanks, and heaters. The company also exports its products to South America, the United States, Europe, and Asia. Longvie S.A. was founded in 1918 and is based in Villa Martelli, Argentina.
